issue.title: Thrusters Not Connected to Base Link in TF Tree

content.raw: I’ve been trying to figure out the same issue for the last few days and haven’t had any luck. I compiled a docker image of VRX from source so that I could add in RViz functionality \(the pre-made docker image I was using didn’t have RViz installed\), and the tf transform data has been missing the thrusters ever since. Thank you for posting this!
content.html: I’ve been trying to figure out the same issue for the last few days and haven’t had any luck. I compiled a docker image of VRX from source so that I could add in RViz functionality (the pre-made docker image I was using didn’t have RViz installed), and the tf transform data has been missing the thrusters ever since. Thank you for posting this!
